name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-security-role-management
title: Security Role Management
shortDescription: This solution allows admins to manage assignment of Security Roles, Column Security Profiles, and Users to Azure AD synced teams via a Canvas App.
longDescription: This solution allows admins to manage assignment of Security Roles, Column Security Profiles, and Users to Azure AD synced teams via a Canvas App. A Power Automate Cloud Flow is also included to create AAD synced team for demo purposes.

references.name: Overview of creating apps in Power Apps
references.description: Overview of creating apps in Power Apps
